# userName

**Instance Property**

The username of this passkey credential.

## Declaration

```swift
var userName: String { get }
```

## Discussion

The passkey reports its `userName` value as its [doc://com.apple.authenticationservices/documentation/AuthenticationServices/ASCredentialIdentity/user].

## Associating a user

- **userHandle**: The user handle of this passkey credential.

items.description: The user handle of this passkey credential.
